markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Dragon Rune Bracelet](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2322)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Focused" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=74" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 148 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 1,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _dragon rune bracelet_ is a gold bangle formed around the scale of a famous [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50). The bracelet is etched with esoteric symbols or words in [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2) that indicate kinship with dragons. As many types of _dragon rune bracelet_ exist as there are types of dragons, though bracelets associated with [uncommon](/Traits.aspx?ID=159) or [rare](/Traits.aspx?ID=137) dragons have the same rarity as the dragon.

 While wearing a _dragon rune bracelet_, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks while interacting with dragons of the same type as the bracelet's scale (such as [red dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168)  or [cloud dragons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=176)). You also gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effects from any kind of dragon.

<document level="2" id="action-1872" />

**Craft Requirements** You are a sorcerer of a draconic bloodline.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragon Rune Bracelet
